summary: Completed Phase 4 (extensionSeed_consistent fully proven including cross-sign case). Sorry count reduced from 8 to 5. Phases 5-6 remain for controlled Lindenbaum proofs.

artifacts.summary: Detailed implementation summary covering Phases 1-4 completion, Decision Checkpoint, and remaining work
Updated implementation plan with Phase 4 and Decision Checkpoint marked complete

completion_data.completion_summary: Completed Phase 4 of augmented extension seed approach. Proved extensionSeed_consistent theorem including challenging cross-sign case (GContent + HContent consistency via forward_G propagation and T-axioms). Reduced sorry count from 8 to 5. Decision Checkpoint completed: continuing with ZornFamily approach. Phases 5-6 (controlled Lindenbaum) remain.
